channel.title: BM Trailer on YouTube?
channel.description:
So, a couple of months back, I made a post where I linked to the BMRF Emergency Broadcast message that was up the day before the launch on YouTube [youtu.be/wVG0pjzDX58](https://youtu.be/wVG0pjzDX58)
Well, I'm back, and this time I have an even better one: the BMRF Trailer.
Here it is: [youtu.be/DgTg5BzAnCg](https://youtu.be/DgTg5BzAnCg)
Feel free to link it to anyone who might be interested in the game. Links to the site and Steam page are also in the description of the video as well.
And before anyone asks, yes, I did get permission to do this.
